mapper.select: select commodity.commodityId,commodityTitle,commodityPrice,commodityInventory,commodityPicture,attribute.attributeName,detail.attributeValue from commodity,attribute,detail where attribute.attributeId = detail.attributeId and detail.commodityId = commodity.commodityId and commodity.commodityTitle like CONCAT('%',#{commodityTitle},'%')

select commodity.commodityId,commodityTitle,commodityPrice,commodityInventory,commodityPicture,attribute.attributeName,detail.attributeValue from commodity,attribute,detail where attribute.attributeId = detail.attributeId and detail.commodityId = commodity.commodityId ORDER BY commodity.commodityId ASC LIMIT 0,12
